reviews.author: Leo Spencer
reviews.review: The management is wonderful.  When a pipe burst and two buildings were left without water for about a day, they quickly delivered gallons of water to each apartment and set up plenty of outhouses.  They also kept us updated via email

reviews.author: Kate Welch
reviews.review:
I lived in the New England Apartments for 2 years while I was a student, and while overall it was a decent experience, there are some definite pros and cons.
The apartments themselves are nice enough, clean and spacious. But they're built

reviews.author: Marie Sullivan
reviews.review: Ive lived in the New England Apartments for almost a year now. Weve had a lot of things that needed to be fixed, (sink replacement, refrigerator replacement, etc), but it was always done in a timely manner and the maintenance guy is so so
